content: 3 times 15 sts r15 single_crochet 3 decrease 1 3 times 12 sts r16 decrease 1 6 times fasten_off leaving a yarn tail for sewing add a little more stuffing as needed use the yarn tail to weave through the front loops of the 6 sts and pull tight to close the hole secure with a knot and stuff the end inside the body your baby manatee s body should now look as pictured to the right snout r1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in first chain 6 sts r2 single_crochet 2 in each st around 12 sts r3-5 single_crochet 12 3 total row sew the snout to the baby manatee s body between the eyes right before you finish sewing it on stuff the snout with a little stuffing flippers make 2 r1 chain 2 4 single_crochet in first chain 4 sts r2 single_crochet 1 2 single_crochet in next st 2 times 6 sts r3-4 single_crochet 6 fasten_off leaving a yarn tail for sewing count 2 row back from the eyes and sew the flippers to the sides of the baby manatee s body tail r1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in first chain 6 sts r2 single_crochet 2 in each st around 12 sts r3-4 single_crochet 12 12 sts r5 single_crochet 2 decrease 1 3 times 9 sts fasten_off leaving a yarn tail for sewing sew the tail to the back of the baby manatee s body over top of the small opening at the back of the body and now you are finished enjoy
